dcterms:creator: Haoliang Li
Sinno Jialin Pan
Shiqi Wang
Alex C Kot
dcterms:description: PACS consists of 9,991 images of seven classes from four domains - photo, art-painting, cartoon and sketch. The model is trained on any three of the four domains, which we call source domains, and tested on the last (target) domain.
dcterms:title: PACS

dcterms:creator: Hemanth Venkateswara
Jose Eusebio
Shayok Chakraborty
Sethuraman Panchanathan
dcterms:description: Office-Home contains about 15,500 images of 65 categories for object recognition in office and home environments.
dcterms:title: Office-Home

dcterms:creator: Vihari Piratla
Praneeth Netrapalli
Sunita Sarawagi
dcterms:description: Rotated MNIST is used to evaluate domain generalization, with a subset of 2,000 images from MNIST and 10,000 images from Fashion-MNIST, which is considered to have been rotated by 0°.
dcterms:title: Rotated MNIST

dcterms:creator: Vihari Piratla
Praneeth Netrapalli
Sunita Sarawagi
dcterms:description: Fashion-MNIST is used to evaluate domain generalization, with a subset of 10,000 images from Fashion-MNIST, which is considered to have been rotated by 0°.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST
